resources.string:
Fixed clicking on links, and re-enabled them 
Added text options for list 
Added text options for editor 
Adjusted single line display to only show titles 
Fixed the widget plus button when showing all 
Added search field to location reminders 
Temporary fix for bug which could clear all items on sync 
Translations 
Crash fixes

App has been rewritten from scratch 
UI has been updated 
Sync has been rewritten 
Say note to self in Google search to create a new note 
Location reminders 
Reminders can be set to repeat 
Items dragged to be sorted manually 
Lists can have individual sort options 
Deleted notes can be restored 
View and restore changes in the Time Machine 
Customizable date formats 
Widget has been updated and given a preview configuration
